SEARCH
Package model.GameState

Enum Class TurnState

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<TurnState>
model.GameState.TurnState
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<TurnState>, Constable
public enum TurnState extends Enum<TurnState>
a finite state machine that keeps track of the states occuring during the turn of a player, the states are divided in: starter card selection stage colour selection stage card dealing stage normal stage (card selection, coordinates selection, drawing a card) objective calculation stage

  • Nested Class Summary

    • isStartingState

      public boolean isStartingState()
      Checks if the current state is a starting state.
      Returns:
      true if the current state is either GAME_INITIALIZATION, OBJECTIVE_SELECTION, or STARTER_CARD_SELECTION.
